arts.ttl: Millwall boss Neil: We’ll need a pre-season to make playing back five fully work
arts.sum: Alex Neil has talked about Millwall needing a pre-season to really sort out playing a wing-back system after tonight’s 1-1 draw at Preston North End. “We have certainly played better since I’ve been here,” Neil told Millwall TV.

arts.ttl: Millwall boss Neil: We’ll need to pre-season to make playing back five fully work
arts.sum: Alex Neil has talked about Millwall needing a pre-season to really sort out playing a wing-back system after tonight’s 1-1 draw at Preston North End. “If you look at all the games we’ve had at the moment a back five is a little bit of a challenge.

arts.ttl: Preston hit back to hold Millwall
arts.sum: Emil Riis scored a long-range equaliser to deny Alex Neil a win against his old club as Preston drew 1-1 with Millwall in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Emil Riis stunner denies Millwall boss Alex Neil victory on Preston return
arts.sum: Mihailo Ivanovic had opened the scoring.

Preston held promotion contenders Burnley to a goalless draw on Saturday in a contest marred by an off-the-ball incident between Hannibal and Milutin Osmajic. The result was a positive one for the Lil...

arts.ttl: FA looking into Mejbri’s racism allegation against Preston’s Osmajic
arts.sum: Burnley player says he received ‘disgusting abuse’ Preston say Osmajic has ‘strongly refuted the claims’ The Football Association is examining claims that Burnley’s Hannibal Mejbri was racially abused by a Preston player during their Championship fixture on Saturday. The midfielder said he received “disgusting abuse” from Milutin Osmajic during the 0-0 draw, and submitted a complaint to the match officials. Preston said Osmajic had “strongly refuted the claims” in a meeting with the match officials after the full-time whistle. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: ‘Back to haunt them’ – Preston North End vs Millwall prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Preston North End vs Millwall prediction ahead of the Championship clash on Tuesday. The post ‘Back to haunt them’ – Preston North End vs Millwall prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: ‘It’s been handled in an extremely good fashion’ - Millwall boss Alex Neil provides positive review
arts.sum: “What you can see is that we performed very well today against one of the teams that is in the play-offs and ready to try and get out of the league. One building into Dagenham and one building into Leeds, both cup games, so I haven’t had a clean week even for a league game.
